name: Cauliflower Steaks
description: Serve these oven-roasted cauliflower steaks in place of meat or as a side dish.
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F (205° C). Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner
Remove outer leaves of the cauliflower, keeping core attached.
Using a large knife, cut cauliflower through core into 4—1⁄2" thick steaks. (Some florets will break loose; save those for another recipe.)
Brush cauliflower steaks with oil and sprinkle with seasoning and dip mix.
Place on Sheet Pan and roast for 20 minutes, turning halfway through, until golden and tender. Season to taste.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: Take simple grilled steaks and oven-roasted beef up a notch! Sprinkle this sodium-free blend liberally to complement the taste of the meat.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
